titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States allowing an item veto in appropriations Acts.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 4/8/1987--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Permits the President to disapprove any item of appropriation in any bill or resolution, except an item of appropriation for national defense. Subjects such bills to the same proceedings as other bills disapproved by the President.
